Plot: Set in the early 70s, a Holocaust survivor tries to come to terms with his past in order to save his relationship with his family in the present.
Title: Opening Night
Writer: Daniel Finkelman (story), Sam Fischler (story), Alex Kohn (screenplay), Michael Puro (screenplay)
Actors: DuDu Fisher, Adam Margules, Janice Hall, Nora Liebman
